title: Help Please. And thank you.
content:
Need to fine something as close to this as possible. i know for a fact it is an existing face, and not custom, but i can’t track it down. thanks. Much appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174227im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/phantomlake_6004.jpg)

author: mpayson

comments.content:
Looks like P22 Posada, but stretched horizontally.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/posada/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174227/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/posada/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/posada/")
